snippet: Justice officials recommended investigations of surviving guards from Auschwitz-Birkenau in renewed efforts to punish Holocaust crimes.
abstract: German justice officials recommend that local prosecutors open investigations against 30 surviving guards from the Auschwitz-Birkenau death camp on suspicion that they were accessories to murder; recommendation is part of an effort to bring lower-level perpetrators of the Holocaust to justice.
lead_paragraph: Justice officials recommended investigations of surviving guards from Auschwitz-Birkenau in renewed efforts to punish Holocaust crimes.

headline.main: Germany Sends 30 Death Camp Cases to Local Prosecutors
headline.print_headline: Germany Sends 30 Death Camp Cases to Local Prosecutors

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
